title: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut
notes: Impossible to go online (Game crashes, error message). Starts with DX9/11 and OpenGL but only palyable with OpenGL renderer.

title: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut
notes:
dx9 has shader (missing texture?) glitches and missing 2D graphics and freezes on exit. dx11 exits gracefully but has the same glitches
OpenGL has missing 2D graphics. Since map graphics are missing, I call the game unplayable.
Apart from those issues, the game is pretty stable

title: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut
notes: Works only in offline mode, missing textures and graphical glitches.
missing textures make it hard to play
